Question Type: from cause to effect with intervention
Explanation: If the systemLoad is decreased by 20 units during debugMode, it effectively mitigates the extra load added by debugMode. Assuming the original systemLoad was near the boundary value (around 60), reducing it to 40 will move performance from low (2) to high (10) as per the calculation rules of the calculatePerformance function, showing an intervention-triggered shift from cause (systemLoad changes) to effect (system performance).
